course_description: Learn to code from scratch with Python: write real programs, automate tasks, and build a foundation for data science, web dev, and AI in just one course.
course_overview: This hands-on course takes absolute beginners from zero to confident Python programmers. You will set up a modern development environment, master core syntax and control flow, organize code with functions and modules, manipulate files and data, and deploy a capstone project. Along the way you will cultivate problem-solving skills and good engineering practices such as version control, debugging, and readable documentation. By the end you will be ready to specialize in web development, data analysis, automation, or machine learning.
target_audience: Aspiring programmers, analysts, scientists, and curious professionals with no prior coding experience who want a practical start in software development.
prerequisites: Ability to install software on your machine
learning_outcomes: Install and configure Python 3 and Visual Studio Code
Apply variables, operators, and built-in data structures to solve problems
Construct programs using conditionals, loops, and functions
Demonstrate debugging techniques to locate and fix runtime errors
Create, read, and update text and CSV files programmatically
Organize reusable code into modules and packages
Evaluate alternative algorithms for efficiency and readability
Design and implement a command-line application with user interaction
